children.text: What Counts as Big and Bulky?

Unlock more of your WFS catalog with big and bulky items. If you’ve sent standard items to WFS before, the item setup, packaging and inbounding processes are all the same. Send inventory to WFS facilities through freight shipping, and we’ll take care of delivering big and bulky items to customers in a reliable and timely manner. Here are just some examples of big and bulky items:
Home appliances (e.g., big screen TVs, refrigerators)
Sporting and recreation equipment (e.g., kayaks, bikes, home gyms, pool tables)
Outdoor items (e.g., pools, trampolines, patio furniture)
What Counts as Big and Bulky?
Your item is considered big and bulky if it meets
Unit weight is between 150 lb. and up to 500 lb.
Longest side is between 108 in. and up to 120 in.
Longest side + girth* is greater than 165 in.
Your big and bulky item must also be able to fit through a trailer door. Make sure it follows these limits:
Shortest side is less than 93 in.
Imagine Bentonville Sporting Goods sells kayaks. Each one weighs 36 lb. and is 120" x 28" x 14." To determine if it’s eligible for the Big and Bulky tier:
This kayak is a big and bulky item because its longest side and longest side + girth meet the criteria. Its dimensions are also within a trailer’s limits.
The simplest way to preview fulfillment and storage fees is through the
. Just tell us the item dimensions and weight, and we’ll automatically calculate estimated fees. Big and bulky fees are based only on unit weight. We do not charge for packaging or pallet weight.
For a complete breakdown of fees, including storage and return shipping, see the

to a WFS facility. See the
, we can only accept 48” x 40” pallets for freight at this time. For non-standard pallet sizes, please use a different carrier.

Big and bulky items that have been properly packed and labeled will be checked in within 2 business days. However, items that require unplanned prep work, arrive during peak (October 1–December 31), or other circumstances may take up to ten days to process.

Big and bulky items are shipped using ground transportation and may require more than 2 days for delivery. The shipping speed will depend on your assigned fulfillment center and the customer’s location. On company.com, items will have a 3+day shipping tag but customers will see a more accurate estimate in the listing’s details.

be returned in stores. Instead, customers can return big and bulky items by scheduling a pickup. The customer will get instructions on how to do so, including placing the item outside their home’s door. They do not need to repackage the item as the carrier will take care of it and transport items directly from a customer’s home to a WFS return center.

to assess the returned item. If it’s in a sellable condition, we’ll put the item back in inventory. However, customers may return big and bulky items already assembled or with damaged packaging. If the item is unsellable, we’ll send it back to you or dispose of it. Note that for any returns identified as
, company will keep the inventory regardless of your
Q: What fulfillment centers will I ship to?

A: Our non-sort facilities are distributed throughout the US. You’ll be assigned a WFS facility once you create an inbound order in Seller Center. We determine the ship-to location based on geographic sales demand and available capacity.
Q: Can I send an item that has multiple boxes?
to WFS fulfillment centers. You’ll need set up the item in your catalog as a sellable set made up of multiple boxes (e.g., trampoline shipped as a safety net, jump mat and legs).
Q: Are big and bulky items part of company+ assortment?
A: Yes, big and bulky items are included in company+. company+ members will get free shipping on those items.
Q: Can I have big and bulky items returned to me?
A. Yes, you can have your big and bulky items sent back to you rather than being restocked or disposed of. Make sure to set your return preferences in Seller Center. Removal fees will apply.
Q: Can I apply discounts to big and bulky item fulfillment?
A: Promotional discounts are not eligible for big and bulky items.
